scripts.deploy-test: aws s3 sync build/static s3://test-brace-web/static --size-only --delete --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000 && aws s3 sync build s3://test-brace-web --exclude static/* --size-only --delete --acl public-read && aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://test-brace-web/service-worker.js --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://test-brace-web/index.html --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1IMMCHCDM4Y81 --paths /index.html
scripts.deploy-prod: aws s3 sync build/static s3://brace-web/static --size-only --delete --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000 && aws s3 sync build s3://brace-web --exclude static/* --size-only --delete --acl public-read && aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://brace-web/service-worker.js --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://brace-web/index.html --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id ECEBYZH814VT0 --paths /index.html
